alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Jones; Shackelford; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 08 at 12:45AM CDT until May 08 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Callahan County in west central Texas... Southeastern Jones County in west central Texas... Southwestern Shackelford County in west central Texas... Northeastern Taylor County in west central Texas... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1244 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Dyess Afb, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Abilene around 1250 AM CDT. Caps around 1250 AM CDT. Buffalo Gap around 1255 AM CDT. Wylie around 110 AM CDT. Potosi around 135 AM CDT. Hamby and Eula around 145 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Impact, Lake Fort Phantom Hill and Kirby Lake. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 274 and 297. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
